title: rachael9385
author: rachael9385
content: As of yesterday, my merit history was at 168 but today I have received 2 merits from different users, so it is 170 now but I am a little bit confused about the Bitcointalk telegram SuperNotifier, today I received a merit from @JJG then my merits history shows 169 merits but the telegram SuperNotifier tells this .Then just in a couple of minute I receive another merit from @fillippone and it still show me this  instead of 170 merits, please can someone tell me where the remaining 5 merits go to?

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: It’s an error from your bot reader. The BTT supernotifier bot might have given a double record for your merit in the past, and this record and its number have been stored on its database. When you receive new merit, the count continues from the bot stop and not what your merit count is. There have been about two threads about such complaints here in the past.

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: A long time ago I also faced this type of error.  When this type of double notification comes, you can go to the notification bot and use the /setMerit x keyword to solve the problem. As seeing that your current total merit is 170 . Hope this will solve your error.Copy the code and paste on telegram bot Code:/setMerit 170

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: It's normal thing because this is not the first time things like this is happening and issues are being raised and discuss about it for many times here in the forum. The bot is having problem giving accurate merit count some time but it will definitely catch up in the coming days. I have experience it before and even yesterday when I received merit too. You have nothing to worry about since the merit is intact in your profile. The developer of the bot is doing a great job for the maintenance up to the moment else we would have been missing some important updates.You may consider locking the thread since you received explanations and suggestion.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: You can use the forum as your most reliable source to check your earned merit stats.Bookmark your profile page and check it anytime you want to see your merit. Even you don't log in, you can see the stats but if you need details like merit transaction, which post merited and from who, you must login your account.Using third party tools like Telegram notification bots or websites like Bpip.org or Ninjastic.space means some more inaccuracy or delay for updates. Those tools rely on their data scrapers in Bitcointalk. Sometimes data scrapers can not work or issues between scrapers and their Telegram bots.If you notice well, even earned merit stats in Bitcoin has delay visually. Sometimes it takes like few seconds (10 seconds perhaps or a bit longer) to update and show.

comments.author: Chilwell
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on October 26, 2023, 04:13:15 PMAs of yesterday, my merit history was at 168 but today I have received 2 merits from different users, so it is 170 now but I am a little bit confused about the Bitcointalk telegram SuperNotifier, today I received a merit from @JJG then my merits history shows 169 merits but the telegram SuperNotifier tells this .Then just in a couple of minute I receive another merit from @fillippone and it still show me this  instead of 170 merits, please can someone tell me where the remaining 5 merits go to?Click the link to reset ithttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5248878.msg62931100#msg62931100

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Good work guy, I have resolved the issues with your helps.Quote from: Crypto Library on October 26, 2023, 04:19:20 PMA long time ago I also faced this type of error.  When this type of double notification comes, you can go to the notification bot and use the /setMerit x keyword to solve the problem. As seeing that your current total merit is 170 . Hope this will solve your error.Copy the code and paste on telegram bot Code:/setMerit 170I have finally solved it with the format you shared with me.Quote from: Nwada001 on October 26, 2023, 04:15:56 PMIt’s an error from your bot reader. The BTT supernotifier bot might have given a double record for your merit in the past, and this record and its number have been stored on its database. When you receive new merit, the count continues from the bot stop and not what your merit count is. There have been about two threads about such complaints here in the past.Actually, it hasn't been long I decided to my BTT account to the telegram SuperNotifier for notifications that's why is was a bit confusing to me, but I have finally solved the issues.Once again thanks to all of you for your helps.
